name: Greenhouse
description: The Greenhouse enables enterprises and midsize businesses to recruit top performers with the right talent skills, aligning them to key goals and performance while developing and compensating them appropriately.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: A key used to generate a validation hash of the event notification webhook callback payload

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression, or the where clause, without the WHERE keyword, in a typical SQL query (i.e. field='value' ). Supported search terms: created_before, created_after, updated_before, updated_after, job_id, email and candidate_ids. All other search criteria are ignored. NOTE: When searching by job_id, do not quote the value (For Example: job_id=15693430 ), as the job_id is a number rather than a string. When searching by candidate_ids, quote the value (For Example: candidate_ids='47436420,47436388').

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page. Defaults to 100 if not provided

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve. Defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user issuing this request. Required for auditing purposes

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression, or the where clause, without the WHERE keyword, in a typical SQL query (i.e. field='value'). Supported search terms: created_before, created_after, updated_before, updated_after, requisition_id, and opening_id. All other search criteria are ignored. NOTE: When searching by opening_id, do not quote the value (For example: opening_id=15693430), as the ID is a number rather than a string. When searching by created_before, created_after, updated_before, updated_after quote the value (For example: created_before='2015-11-19T19:53:32.565Z' .

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression, or the where clause, without the WHERE keyword, in a typical SQL query (i.e. field='value'). Supported search terms: status. All other search criteria are ignored. NOTE: When searching by status='closed' quote the value (For Example: status='closed'), status can only be 'opened' or 'closed'.
